choices.text:
Below is an instruction that describes a task. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

### Instruction:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company

### Response:

I have been offered and accepted a position at another company, so I will no longer be working here. Please let me know if there is anything else I can do for you. Thank you for your time and consideration.Sincerely, [Your Name Here]
